channel.title: Question about hosting methods for servers
channel.description: Okay, so I already have my server the way I want it. It's currently hosted on Hamachi, because i'm not able to forward ports. My question is this. Is there any way to host a server, without Hamachi OR port forwarding?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 01, 2006, 07:56:04 PM[/size][hr]I'm sorry, but can an admin/mod move this to the questions section?

item.title: Question about hosting methods for servers
item.dc:creator: @socco socco
item.description:
@socco wrote:

pancholip:

i’d recommend doing port forwarding and then using scape-rune.net. to set up port forwarding just go to portforward.com, select your routers brand and model and view the default guide. set port forwarding to port 43594. its not hard to do.

CHEERS!

Read full topic
item.source: Question about hosting methods for servers
